data.name: MsgAttentionRegEmailSent
data.value: Thank you for registering. An email has been sent to {0}. Please check your email and use the enclosed link to finish the registration process. If you don't see the email, please check in the junk folder. In rare cases emails can take up to 1 hour to be deliver.

data.value: These subjects will be used to notify you when a new question/project which includes any of the subjects you entered has been added.

data.value: At least one subject needs to be associated with your question. 5 subjects maximum.

data.name: RedirectFromPayPalPmtSuccess
data.value:
Your payment has been successfully received, and we have sent you an email with the order details.
Thank you for using Myra English.

data.name: RedirectFromPayPalPostedNoPmtReceivedYet
data.value:
We are still waiting for payment notification from PayPal.
Please check the status of your question/project in a few more minutes by going to “Filter by” and selecting “My questions/projects“. If the payment was received, the question/project status will be set to “Open”.

data.name: MsgErrorMissingAnswerDescription
data.value: The answer description cannot be empty.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexMainHeader
data.value: Get a fast answer to your question/projects or get paid to answer a question/project.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader1
data.value: Post questions or projects and offer money for the answer/solution

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader1Text
data.value: Offer a dollar amount per question/project and see users rush to give you the right answer/solution. Select the 1st correct answer/solution to award the prize.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader2
data.value: Market your question/project and get fast results

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader2Text
data.value: Provide a marketing amount and payforanswer will create a ad campaign on websites that are related to your questions/projects subjects.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader3Text
data.value: Get paid by providing answers and/or solutions to questions/projects and see the money go into your PayPal account.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader4Text
data.value: View all highest paying open questions/projects.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader5Text
data.value: Enter your subjects of expertise and see the highest paying questions/projects by the subjects you are familiar with.

data.name: ViewHomeIndexSubHeader6Text
data.value: In order to get paid for an accepted answer/solution, you need to have a paypal account and an email account registered with PayPal.

data.name: MsgInfoAccountLocked
data.value: Your account has been locked. Please try again in {0} minutes.

data.name: MsgInfoCompleteRegistration
data.value: You have not completed the registration process. To complete this process look for the email sent to {0} that provides instructions.

data.name: ViewUnauthFilterBySubjectsTitle
data.value: Find questions by the subjects below:

data.name: MsgNonRefundableCharge
data.value: The charge of ${0} is non-refundable, do you want to proceed?

data.name: lblEnablePostButton
data.value: Please log in to enable this button.

data.name: lblAllPaidOrSelfAcceptedQuestions
data.value: All Paid or Self Accepted Questions/Projects

data.name: MsgAddCommentsToolTip
data.value: Use comments to ask for more information or suggest improvements. Avoid answering questions/projects in comments.

data.name: GoogleAdLinkTooltip
data.value: This will be a direct link to your question

data.name: lblQDescriptionTooltip
data.value: Give as much information as possible related to your question/project. Include assumptions, definitions, and if possible details/attributes of what you expect to see in a successful answer/solution. You can either write all the details in this textbox or write a small summary in the text box and direct the users to read more details in any attach documents you may have.

data.name: lblQuestionAmountMarketingTooltip
data.value: This is the budget that will be used to pay to display your question/project for 1 day as ads in websites related to the subjects associated with your question/project. Most sites charge for each click to your ad. So if you specify a $5 marketing amount and if 5 users click on an ad that cost $1 each after the 5 users have clicked on your ad, your marketing amount will be used up and your ad will no longer be displayed.

data.name: lblQuestionAmountTooltip
data.value: This is the amount paid to the person who posts the answer that you accept.

data.name: QuestionSubjectExplanation
data.value: You can add up to {0} subjects that relate to your question/project. Enter the subjects in the text box below in order of importance. They will be used as part of the ad campaign as well as to notify users familiar with those subjects of your question/project. When done, you can click the refresh ad button below to updated the ad previews below with the first few subjects that fit in the ad.

data.name: TitleNewQuestionTooltip
data.value: Title of your question/project as will appear in the Ad. {0} character max length.

data.name: GoogleAdsWillLookLikeThese
data.value: Most of your ads will look like the ads below. The first line will be a direct link to your question/project. Depending on your budget amount your ads may show in Facebook, Google, Gmail, Youtube, Twitter, LinkedIn, G+, and many other sites related to your question/project subjects.

data.name: txtIncreaseAmount
data.value: Increase question/project amount and/or add a new marketing campaign

data.name: txtIncreaseMarketingAmountPerDayBy
data.value: Increase marketing amount per day by:

data.name: NumberOfMarketingDaysDescription
data.value: This is the number of days that your marketing campaign will be run using ads.

data.name: AddMoneyBtnDescription
data.value: Use this button to add a new marketing campaign and/or increase the amount paid for your question/project.

data.name: TotalMarketingBudget

data.name: AcceptedAnswerDescription
data.value: Marking the answer as accepted will close the question/project and will cause the poster to get paid the question/project amount. Also, all attachments in the answers that were NOT accepted will be deleted.

data.name: ReviewedAnswerDescription
data.value: Marking an answer as reviewed will move it below answers with a status of submitted. You will still have the option to accept it, but it will have lower priority than answers with status of submitted.

data.name: GoogleSearchKeywordsDescr
data.value: Please enter Google search keyword lines in each of the text boxes below. This will help us optimize your ad campaign to show people as they search for specific terms or visit certain websites. Your keywords should match the terms you would use to search for the answer/solution using Google's search engine. Avoid one-word keywords. As an example, if your question/project had to do with student loans you could have the following keyword searchers: 1) loans for college, 2) college loans, 3)student loans for college, 4) government loans for college, 5) college student loans, 6) loans for college students, 7) student college loans, 8) college student loan, college loan, 9) college loan rates, 10) students loans for college, etc.

data.name: MsgErrorMissingGoogleSearchKeyword
data.value: Please ensure that you have entered google search keywords in all the Google search keyword text boxes listed below.

data.name: CampaignsCatTakeUpTo24Hrs
data.value: Marketing campaigns can take up to 24 hours before they start.

data.value: You have entered an invalid combination of characters in the title. Please change your title and try again. Some of the following characters may be causing the issue: {0}
